EmailTemplate.subject: Introducing Facebook Checkout — sell more on the world’s largest social network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
BigCommerce is excited to announce a new addition to your Facebook Shop integration. Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, BigCommerce is excited to announce a new addition to your Facebook Shop integration that will enable you to sell more on the world’s largest social network.
Facebook Checkout gives customers the ability to complete their entire purchase on Facebook. If you already have products listed on Facebook through our existing integration, Facebook Checkout is a simple addition to your business.
This integration is ready today in your control panel within the Channel Manager section. Check it out today to sell more with Facebook!
Get Started <[[https://login.bigcommerce.com/login]]> Happy Selling, Chris Rising Vice President, Marketing
